base_description: Rectangular black lighter with gray top.
part_description: Features a black rectangular body and a gray top with a metal wheel and ignition button.
internal_interaction_description: The metal wheel strikes against a flint, creating a spark. This ignites the gas released by pressing the ignition button, producing a flame at the top.
external_interaction_description: Used to produce a flame for lighting cigarettes, candles, or other objects. Requires manual operation by pressing the ignition button and may interact with wind, affecting flame stability.
